title: X power Y
description: Write a program to find X power Y
contentHtml:
Write a program to find X power Y

Input:  2 4
Output: 16

# Write a program to find X power Y

x, y = input("Input: ").split()
print('Output: ', int(x)**int(y))


// Write a program to find X power Y

"use strict";

// perform following command to run programme
// node x-power-y.js

const readline = require("readline");

const rl = readline.createInterface({
  input: process.stdin,
  output: process.stdout,
});

rl.question("Input  : ", (nums) => {
  let [x, y] = nums.split(" ").map(Number);
  if (isNaN(x) || isNaN(y)) {
    console.error("Some error occured");
  } else {
    console.log(`Òutput : ${Math.pow(x, y)}`);
  }
  rl.close();
});


// Write a program to find X power Y
#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>

int main(void)
{
    double x, y;
    printf("Input  : ");
    scanf("%lf %lf", &x, &y);
    printf("Output : %d\n", (int)pow(x, y));
    return 0;
}
